import React from 'react'; import './App.css' import './Form.css' export default function Confirmation(props) { const {orders} = props; if (!orders) { return

No data returned...

} return (

Thanks for ordering. See you soon!

Size: {orders.dropdown}

Sauce: {orders.sauces}

Topping(s): {orders.toppings.map(topping => topping)}

{orders.text_area}

) }
